title: Gorgeous 1/1 apt
posting_body: ['Gorgeous 1/1 in Luxurious Aventine, a community well located in Miramar.', 'Close to I75, Pembroke Lake Mall, and Shop Pembroke Gardens.', 'Resort-style living with guard Card/Electric Gate and security patrol.', 'Spacious living area and bedroom, nice open kitchen with granite counter tops.', 'This prime location offers a beautiful club house, community pool, jogging area, beautiful lake, gym, tennis, volleyball court, and many amenities.', 'water, pet control, valet trash.', '2544 Centergate Dr # 305 MIRAMAR, FL 33025-0724', 'PROPERTY ID:  GTA11241578', 'Type of Property: apt', 'List Price:\t$1,950', 'Bedrooms:  1', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'SqFt (Liv):¤800', 'CALL OR TEXT TODAY', 'show contact info', 'Global Trust Realty, LLC posts properties for a 30 day period of time.', ' Due to current high rental demand, some properties advertised may be withdrawn, cancelled, rented, pending or sold within the past 30 days.', ' All prices are subject to change based upon availability.', 'All information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.', 'Listed and Brokered by:Beachfront Realty Inc']
